    • getPlayer

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer(Player player)

    • getHand

      public Hand getHand()

    • setHand

      public void setHand(Hand hand)

    • selectCell

      public boolean selectCell(int r, int c)
      During SelectionCards of GamePhase, when the player click on an item, the command will memorize the item position and reference in the PlayerHand if is Selectable(at least one item adjacent) and if is Orthogonal to the other selected cards

      To revisit

      参数:
      r - row
      c - column
      返回:
      false : Selection failed, true: selection successful

    • clearSelectedCards

      public boolean clearSelectedCards()
      Triggered maybe by right-click During Selection Phase: Clear Hand. The Player need to reselect all the cells

    • callEndSelection

      public boolean callEndSelection()
      Triggered maybe by a Confirm Selection Button Or by the timer It will ask the match to change TurnPhase in Insertion

    • tryToInsert

      public boolean tryToInsert(int col)
      Request for the Shelf to insert all the selected cards in a column(col)
      参数:
      col - number of column (0-6)
      返回:
      true if the insertion is successful

    • changeHandOrder

      public boolean changeHandOrder(int i, int j)
      This method will call another one in Hand to swap the position of two cards
      参数:
      i - is position 1 (0-3)
      j - is position 2 (0-3)
      返回:
      true if the order has been changed, otherwise false

    • isMyTurn

      public boolean isMyTurn(Player player)
      Verify if is the current Player correspond with the one calling this method
      参数:
      player - player
      返回:
      false if is not player's turn

    • isGamePhase

      public boolean isGamePhase(GamePhase gamePhase)
      Control if the game phase is the same of the one you want
      参数:
      gamePhase - is the phase needed to be
      返回:
      true if the gamePhase is the same of the match game phase

    • callEndInsertion

      public void callEndInsertion()
      This method is called at the end of the insertion. It recalculates the hidden points, which show how many points the player should get from the personal goal It calls match's callEndTurnRoutine() method.

    • addScore

      public void addScore(int points)
      Method to add points to current player's Score
      参数:
      points - points to add

    • isHandEmpty

      public boolean isHandEmpty()

    • isAlreadySelected

      public CardPointer isAlreadySelected(int r, int c)
      Check if the cell is already selected by iterating the hand
      参数:
      r - coordinate x of the board
      c - coordinate y of the boar
      返回:
      the CardPointer of the item already selected, otherwise null

    • dropHand

      public boolean dropHand()
      This method is called when a player is disconnected during a match. It allows to drop the selected items, from the hand, back to the board.
      返回:
      true if any item is dropped, otherwise false:

    • reconnectPlayer

      public void reconnectPlayer()
      This method allow the player to reconnect to the match he got suspended from.
